sentences.tran: 马丘比丘在秘鲁是“古老的顶峰”的意思。 这是世界上最具神秘色彩的古老建筑。
sentences.tranLocal: Machu Picchu in Peru, which means ‘Old Peak, ” is one of the most enigmatic ancient sites in the world.

sentences.tran: 作为考古学家了解这里发生的事情更多，新的问题继续出现，马丘比丘将在未来几年保持它神秘的面貌。
sentences.tranLocal: As archaeologists learn more about what happened here, new questions continue to arise, guaranteeing that Machu Picchu will remain a place of mystery for years to come.

trans.tranLocal: a small hotel or pub, especially an old one in the countryside

sentences.tran: 我们住在假日酒店。
sentences.tranLocal: We’re staying at the Holiday Inn.

phrases.tran: n. 假日酒店；假日旅馆

trans.tran: 不可能的；不值得讨论的

sentences.tran: 他能够把人们吸引到他的周围而且保持他们的忠心；而他的强大吸引力所在之处，就不可能有分裂。
sentences.tranLocal: He could draw men round him and keep them bound to him; while his powerful attraction was there, disruption was out of the question.

sentences.tran: 把我们的电视运到英国是绝对不可能的，不仅仅因为高昂的运输费用，还因为在这里它根本不能工作。
sentences.tranLocal: Shipping our television to the UK was out of the question—not only would it have been prohibitively expensive, it was unlikely to work here anyway.

trans.tranLocal: a long walk in the mountains or countryside

sentences.tran: 林间远足
sentences.tranLocal: a hike in the woods

phrases.tran: 走路；滚开；哪凉快那歇着去

sentences.tran: 但阿基诺三世免除了其密友、内政部副部长普诺(Rico Puno)的所有责任，称他没有违反任何法律法规。
sentences.tranLocal: But he cleared from any liability his close friend, interior deputy minister Rico Puno, saying he did not violate any law or rule.

sentences.tran: 内政部长罗纳尔多·普诺（Ronaldo Puno）说，官员们仍在试图确定约100名持枪歹徒劫持并带到偏远山区的人质的确切数字。
sentences.tranLocal: Officials were still trying to determine the exact number of people intercepted by about 100 gunmen and taken to a remote mountainous area, said the interior secretary, Ronaldo Puno.

trans.tranLocal: a stone structure above or below the ground where a dead person is buried

sentences.tran: 家族坟墓
sentences.tranLocal: the family tomb

trans.tran: （迁入新居、更换工作后）安顿下来
trans.tranLocal: If you settle in, you become used to living in a new place, doing a new job, or going to a new school

sentences.tran: 一旦适应了，我就非常喜欢上学了。
sentences.tranLocal: I enjoyed school enormously once I'd settled in.
